title: Flag of Azerbaijan
cardDescription: The flag of Azerbaijan is a tricolor featuring three equally sized fesses of blue, red, and green, with a white crescent and an eight-pointed star centered in the red.
description: The flag of Azerbaijan is a tricolor featuring three equally sized fesses of blue, red, and green, with a white crescent and an eight-pointed star centered in the red.

content.content: The crescent and the star are easiest to make when using different strands of yarn for each of them.
This pattern is worked horizontally starting from top left.

content: With A, ch 30, sc in 2nd ch and each ch across, turn
Ch 1, sc 10, sbd, sc 2, sdb, sc 15, turn
Ch 1, sc 10, [sbd, sdb, sc 1] x 2, sbd, sc 1, sdb, sc 11, turn
Ch 1, sc 9, sbd, sdb, sc 4, sbd, sc 2, sdb, sc 9, turn
Ch 1, sc 10, [sbd, sdb, sc 1] x 2, sbd, sc 1, sdb, sc 11, turn
Ch 1, sc 10, sbd, sc 2, sdb, sc 14, sbc, turn

content.content: For help with the pattern, please see the General Instructions from the main page:
